title: submit rsvp
description: Defines the basic structure of an RSVP submission response.

message.description: A message with more information about the response (ie. success/error details).

id.description: The unique id for the RSVP.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the RSVP was created.

name.description: The name of the person who submitted the RSVP.

email.description: The email address of the person who submitted the RSVP.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the RSVP was last updated.

eventId.description: The id of the event that the RSVP is for.
